sentences.sentence: You can play as many times as you want in this tourney.
sentences.translation: 你可以多次扮演你想要在这个赛。

sentences.sentence: All I need is a way to crunch out the winners of each tourney round.
sentences.translation: 所有我需要的是紧缩了每一轮锦标赛的优胜者的一种方式。

sentences.sentence: Today is the last day of practice before the tourney kicks into full swing.
sentences.translation: 随着赛事的全面展开，今天是最后一个训练日了。
